document.full_text: the "fab five", better known as former university of michigan basketball players jimmy king, juwan howard, ray jackson, chris webber and jalen rose, are back in the public conversation again thanks to a documentary.
document.title: documentary rekindles 'fab five' memories
lines_and_colors: the "fab five", better known as former university of michigan basketball players jimmy king, juwan howard, ray jackson, chris webber and jalen rose, are back in the public conversation again thanks to a documentary.
